title.rendered: Helicopter cricket shot expert MS Dhoni now takes a drone shot

content.rendered:
The greatest former Indian cricket player and captain is none other than Mahendra Singh Dhoni. He is one of the most famous former players in the history of Indian cricket. The veteran is going to retire soon, and is possibly going to play an important innings again. Recently, the former international cricketer and the captain of the Chennai Super Kings team, is going to be seen as a part of an aerospace company, which specializes in making world class Drones with special features.

The company we are talking about is named as Garuda Aerospace, and it is a Chennai based start-up founded by an honourable prime minister, Shri Narendra Modi. The purpose of this facility is to manufacture the F-35 Lightning II fighter jets.

“I am happy to be part of Garuda Aerospace and look forward to witnessing their growth story with the unique drone solutions they have to offer”

Agnishwar Jayaprakash, the founder and CEO of Mahi Bhai, said that Mahi Bhai is a dream come true for him. He goes on to add that the performance of the show is an acknowledgement of his team.

“Mahi Bhai is the epitome of dedication and I firmly believe that having captain cool on our cap table adds tremendous value which will motivate our team to perform better”

In the Garuda Aerospace, the company focuses on the design, build, and use of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) for industry and application. Depending on customer requirements, the company typically uses precision-class and standards.

More about the company, Garuda Aerospace hold and international standard certification such as ISO9001:2015 and AS9100 which is best considered in the Aerospace quality management systems.

 The former India skipper has invested an undisclosed amount in the start-up Garuda Aerospace and have become the brand ambassador of the company.

Read more: “Three Things…”: Rishabh Pant Reveals What It Takes To Be A Good Wicketkeeper-Batter
